DOC.brief_summary: This randomize pilot clinical trial study well self-care program work head neck cancer survivor lymphedema fibrosis . A self-care program may promote self-care activity manage chronic swell tough/tight tissue head neck region .
DOC.brief_title: Self-Care Head Neck Cancer Survivors With Lymphedema Fibrosis
DOC.detailed_description: PRIMARY OBJECTIVES : I . To complete development self-care program focusing lymphedema fibrosis ( LEF ) head neck cancer ( HNC ) survivor ( LEF-self-care program [ SCP ] ) goal improve LEF associate outcome compare usual care alone . ( Stage I ) II . To determine feasibility program LEF-SCP without follow-up usual care HNC survivor LEF , specifically : 1 ) obtain recruitment estimate determine barrier recruitment ; 2 ) identify barrier implementation ; 3 ) ass safety ; 4 ) evaluate patient satisfaction . ( Stage II ) III . To determine LEF-SCP without follow-up enhances self-efficacy adherence compare usual care HNC survivor LEF . ( Stage II ) IV . To determine preliminary efficacy LEF-SCP without follow-up compare usual care follow outcome : 1 ) LEF progression ; 2 ) symptom burden ; 3 ) functional status . ( Stage II ) OUTLINE : STAGE I : Patients undergo train session study lymphedema therapist review educational manual video development three component LEF self-care program . STAGE II : Patients randomize 1 3 group . GROUP I : Patients receive monthly automate system telephone call 12 month . GROUP II : Patients undergo LEF-SCP training comprise motivational interview ( MI ) session 1 hour LEF self-care training session 1 hour weekly 3 week . Patients receive monthly automate system telephone call 12 month . Patients also review LEF self-care educational manual watch self-care video monthly frequently need . GROUP III : Patients undergo LEF-SCP training comprise MI session 1 hour LEF self-care training session 1 hour weekly 3 week . Patients receive monthly automate system telephone call 12 month . Patients review LEF self-care educational manual watch self-care video monthly frequently need . Patients also meet study lymphedema therapist 1 hour 3 , 6 , 9 month . After completion study , patient follow 3 , 6 , 9 , 12 month .
DOC.criteria: STAGE I Post HNC primary treatment No evidence cancer ( NED ) No 6 week completion initial lymphedema therapy head neck lymphedema > 21 year age Ability understand English order complete questionnaire Able complete onsite training home selfcare activity LEF management Able provide inform consent Patients exclude follow medical condition would prohibit safe implementation selfcare LEF : recurrent metastatic cancer ; active cancer ; acute infection ; congestive heart failure ; renal failure ; cardiac pulmonary edema ; sensitive carotid sinus ; severe carotid blockage ; uncontrolled hypertension STAGE II Eligibility criteria stage I Stage I participant ineligible
